RTRConfig Class Reference

Provides "global" access to a configuration database via the static function configDb(). By default, the available database will be an instance of RTRDefaultConfigDb. The application can override this by instantiating some other type of RTRConfigDb and "installing" it using the setConfigDb() function. More...

#include <config.h>

static void setConfigDb (const RTRConfigDb &db)
static const RTRConfigDb & configDb ()

Detailed Description

Provides "global" access to a configuration database via the static function configDb(). By default, the available database will be an instance of RTRDefaultConfigDb. The application can override this by instantiating some other type of RTRConfigDb and "installing" it using the setConfigDb() function.

See Also:
RTRConfigDb, RTRConfigVariable, RTRDebugConfig, RTRDefaultConfigDb

Member Function Documentation

Operations
Set the global config database.
REQUIRE : !db.error()
